Text: E̩do-mi agba o̩la e̩nyo̩ dufu; e̩wñ kʼu li ugbo onu le̩ naka; ukpalu-mi chʼiko kʼi aya e̩wñ eko̩.
Mʼugbada-we̩ du ji mʼago-we̩, uwe̩ agbiti le̩,
E̩ natanʼe̩wñ alo ef e̩gahi-we̩ ki ra ñwʼe̩
uwe̩ te̩tafe̩do̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa, e̩ la chulaka e̩wñ bibi.
mur kpai alos kpai kasia dʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ chaka.
amo̩ma amonu jʼef abobule̩-we̩ ku ma nʼojima;
Neti, O̩ma-mi onobule̩, go, hi eti-we̩ wane̩;
o̩ma onobule̩ e-Taya la anʼe̩wñ ele wa,
O̩ma onobule̩ e-onu kʼi dʼejefu le̩ chʼojima ojima chaka: o̩jamalia ma ne̩ chʼiya nyʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ;
ma akʼukpo ku ma chʼiya nyu anʼowñ nyʼugbo onu, ma akʼabigbe̩le̩-wñ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma tʼo̩ ubi wʼugbo we̩ ge̩.
Ma ane̩ ma le kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai uyo̩
Naje̩ ñw abo o̩gba o̩gba rewa odu-we̩;
